long_description: A roomy choice for backpacking or camping, the synthetic REI Polar Pod Sleeping Bag is easy on your budget, yet it's also feature-packed and built to last. With a European Norm (EN) lower-limit rating of 27degF, this bag is suitable for 3-season use. Polyester synthetic fill offers all-conditions warmth; offset quilt construction prevents cold spots and stabilizes the insulation. Roomy, rounded shape lets you comfortably move around; hood retains warmth and is big enough to fit a small pillow. 2-way zip lets you open the bag fully for use as a quilt or unzips at the bottom for ventilation. Differentiated drawcords (1 round, 1 flat) let you adjust hood and neck easily in the dark. Draft tube behind zipper combines with a draft collar to seal in warmth. Inner pocket is handy to stow a phone, glasses, light and other essentials. Polyester shell is treated with a durable water repellent finish to repel moisture and stains. The REI Polar Pod Sleeping Bag comes with a stuff sack and a storage bag. European Norm (EN) is an independent third-party temperature rating, allowing accurate comparisons across brands with other EN-rated bags.
